channel.title: Wierd shop error
channel.description:
[code]shop = 1 Shield Shop 1 1 14514 100 3488 100 1187 100 6633 100 3840 100 3122 100 2659 100[/code]
can someone tell me whats wrong with this code? i get a fatal error each time i try this

item.title: Wierd shop error
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

its probably the shop = 1 thing.
First, make sure there is no shop = 1 not including yours.
if there is, go to the bottom of the list, and add a shop = $$

shop = $$ and then $$ will be + 1 the number below shop = $$
so example

shop = 60
shop = 61
shop = 62

Now, you would add shop = 63, because it is the 63rd shop in the game.

Read full topic
